description:
I was out with some friends watching the Gay Pride parade when Jimmy, a fan, recognized me. He wasn’t on a float, but he sure should have been. He had lots of questions about the site and begged to see our new studio. As cute as he is, I was happy to show him around.
A few weeks later, he did more than just get a tour…
I don’t normally film gay guys in solo videos ( I like to utilize their talents elsewhere!). But I had to make an exception for Jimmy since he’s totally turned on by being watched. Eager to show off his cock and ass to the camera, his dick was rock hard as he came out of his pants.
I knew I made the right decision when I saw his cum shot. I haven’t seen anyone shoot as much and as far as Jimmy in a very long time.
title: Jimmy
